title: Plan B
overview: Florence is very busy between her two children, her broadcasting job at a radio, and her involvement in women empowerment. All her world is neat and organized, but it is turned upside down when her daughter Lou, 16, kills herself. Florence had failed to see that the most important part of her life was slowly spiraling downward, and now she can't do anything about it. Or can she?When Florence discovers the existence of the Plan B agency, a company that enables people to go back in time, she feels that she is getting a second chance.
